When set to 'true' (default), the Organization object will be queried synchronously so that the related fields on LogEntryEvent__e will be populated.
When set to 'false', the Organization object will only be queried asynchronously, and the related fields will be null on LogEntryEvent__e but populated on Log__c. This is useful if you want to reduce the syncronous queries used by Nebula Logger you do not rely on the related LogEntryEvent__e fields being populated.
